meanings.definition: To cause delay or prevent progress.
meanings.sent1: The heavy rain was hindering our journey.
meanings.sent2: The traffic jam was hindering the flow of cars.
meanings.sent3: The slow turtle hindering the rabbit's race was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of failure was hindering her from taking risks.
meanings.sent5: The tangled branches hindering the path looked like a maze.

meanings.definition: Acting as an obstacle or barrier.
meanings.sent1: The hindering wall blocked our view of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The hindering regulations made it difficult to proceed.
meanings.sent3: The hindering tree branch seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The hindering fence separated the two properties.
meanings.sent5: The hindering boulder in the road required a detour.
